SQLMAP._COMMNET: manual : for user syntax when fill it disable other config sach as thread,timeout,answer,batch | thread : number of active thread for sqlmap(max 10) | timeout : dead time request for sqlmap | answer : defualt answer for more qeustions

XSS.__COMMENT: path : path of aranchi file in bin directory | manual : syntax of execute (url repalce in program)

_COMMNET: Mode : SLOW or FAST  |  MiddleWare : NORMAL or PROXT or SOCKS | SIGN : NORMAL or DEPTH
